author: costin
msg: - JspWrapper will handle the very special case of Jsps declared in web.xml -
it has strange code, and need a rewrite, but it shouldn't affect the rest of core
- DefaultErrorHandler contains all the error reporting code that used to be in
ServletWrapper - it should be possible now to customize the error page ( more
details, etc) - assuming you add Class.forName() and a bit of code.
- ServletWrapper - just servlet informations, plus load/init/destroy + service calling.

author: costin
msg: A bit of cleanup in ServletWrapper, more to follow.
- replaced handleInvocation() with individual methods for init, destroy, service
( it's easier to read - yes, I know it's longer  :-)
- started the separation of Jsp cases ( path!=null ) - it will probably simplify
everything to have JspWrapper deal with the special case.

author: costin
msg: ( if no provider is set in Context it will return the same results as if
DefaultRSP would return, so there is no point in having it)

author: costin
msg: - moved loader in a separate package ( still need to make the selection of a loader customizable)
